screenshot.caption: EASM file open in Dassault Systemes SolidWorks eDrawings Viewer

description: eDrawings Publisher is a plugin for many major CAD software offerings, including SolidWorks, CATIA, Trimble SketchUp, AutoCAD, and Autodesk Inventor. It allows users to export 2D drawings and 3D models—such as part assemblies or mechanical systems—in compressed, read-only formats ideal for collaboration, documentation, or review.

Users exporting models from a CAD program using the eDrawings Publisher plugin, use the following formats: EASM for sharing 3D assemblies. .EDRW for sharing 2D technical drawings. .EPRT for 3D part files (individual components).
